position.marginalia_text: Ad Meridianu[m] Regiomontis Prussia[e] sup[ra] in Appendice Meridianus iste distat a Tubinge[n]se grad. 17 cuius tempus est 0 hor[a] 8 m[inutae] quanto tempore Montis Regij tempus precedit Tubinge[n]sem supputatione[m]

marginalia.translation: To the meridian of Königsberg in Prussia as above in the appendix. This meridian is 17 degrees from Tübingen away and its time is 0 hours and 8 minutes, by which amount of time the time of Königsberg precedes the Tübingen computation
